Pre-Game Insights: India will be the favourites to win the series with a stacked lineup full of world-beaters.
Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli return to action for the first time after their T20I retirements and will be the key of the batting lineup against a tricky Lankan bowling attack.
Sri Lanka will look for massive improvements after a disappointing performance in the T20I series.
Maheesh Theekshana and Matheesha Pathirana will be crucial for the Lankan bowling.
Dunith Wellalage and Asitha Fernando will look to support their strike bowlers.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The R.Premadasa Stadium in Colombo has produced spin-friendly tracks where batters tend to struggle.
The average score of the venue is 256 in ODIs.
The batters have found it difficult to score runs due to the tracks' slow nature.
The bowlers, especially the spinners, have managed to use the surface to find some grip and turn to contain runs and take wickets.
